com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.voice

Interface InstructionPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPlayer, NavigationInstructionPlayer, PollyPlayer

    public interface InstructionPlayer
    Defines a contract for instruction players used in NavigationView.
    Since:
    0.6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInstructionListener(InstructionListener instructionListener)
      Used to add listener for when instructions begin / end.
      boolean isMuted() 
      void onDestroy()
      Used to stop and release the media (if needed).
      void onOffRoute()
      Used in off-route scenarios to stop current instruction (if playing) and voice a rerouting cue.
      void play(java.lang.String instruction)
      Will play the given string instruction.
      void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
      Will determine if voice instructions will be played or not.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        void play(java.lang.String instruction)
        Will play the given string instruction. If a voice instruction is already playing or other instructions are already queued, the given instruction will be queued to play after.
        Parameters:
        instruction - voice instruction to be synthesized and played.
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • isMuted

        boolean isMuted()
        Returns:
        true if currently muted, false if not
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • setMuted

        void setMuted(boolean isMuted)
        Will determine if voice instructions will be played or not.

        If called while an instruction is currently playing, the instruction should end immediately and any instructions queued should be cleared.

        Parameters:
        isMuted - true if should be muted, false if should not
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • onOffRoute

        void onOffRoute()
        Used in off-route scenarios to stop current instruction (if playing) and voice a rerouting cue.
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • onDestroy

        void onDestroy()
        Used to stop and release the media (if needed).
        Since:
        0.6.0

      • addInstructionListener

        void addInstructionListener(InstructionListener instructionListener)
        Used to add listener for when instructions begin / end.
        Since:
        0.8.0
